tool_description: Creates adaptive streaming manifest files (HLS m3u8, DASH mpd) from encoded video segments to enable seamless quality switching during playback.

base_url.description: Base URL for video segment access

segment_duration.description: Duration of each segment in seconds

manifest_filename.description: Name for the master manifest file

error_messages: Directory not found: Verify encoded_files_directory exists and contains video files
Invalid base URL: Provide a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL
Invalid segment duration: Must be a positive integer
No encoded files found: Ensure the directory contains properly encoded video segments
usage: Provide the directory with encoded videos, specify manifest format, base URL, and segment duration. The tool generates manifest files for adaptive streaming playback.

master_manifest_path.description: Path to the generated master manifest file

variant_manifests.description: Paths to individual quality variant manifests

estimated_startup_time_ms.description: Estimated playback startup time in milliseconds
